<action id="file-menu-command" name="msg.menu.file" mnemonic="F"/> <action id="recent-menu-command" name="msg.file.open.recent"/> <action id="edit-menu-command" name="msg.menu.edit" mnemonic="E"/> <action id="view-menu-command" name="msg.menu.view" mnemonic="V"/> <action id="main-entities-menu-command" name="msg.common.primary.objects" mnemonic="P"/> <action id="secondary-entities-menu-command" name="msg.common.secondary.objects" mnemonic="S"/> <action id="new-entity-menu-command" name="msg.common.new.object" mnemonic="N"/> <action id="parts-menu-command" name="msg.menu.parts" mnemonic="P"/> <action id="charts-menu-command" name="msg.menu.charts" mnemonic="C"/> <action id="tools-menu-command" name="msg.menu.tools" mnemonic="T"/> <action id="window-menu-command" name="msg.common.window" mnemonic="W"/> <action id="load-layout-menu-command" name="msg.docking.load.layout"/>
<action id="new-command" name="msg.file.new" mnemonic="N" smicon="/storybook/resources/icons/16x16/file-new.png" icon="/storybook/resources/icons/16x16/file-new.png" accel="control N"/> <action id="open-command" name="msg.file.open" mnemonic="O" smicon="/storybook/resources/icons/16x16/file-open.png" icon="/storybook/resources/icons/16x16/file-open.png" accel="control O"/> <action id="save-command" name="msg.file.save" mnemonic="S" smicon="/storybook/resources/icons/16x16/file-save.png" icon="/storybook/resources/icons/16x16/file-save.png" accel="control S"/> <action id="save-as-command" name="msg.file.save.as" mnemonic="A" smicon="/storybook/resources/icons/16x16/file-save-as.png" icon="/storybook/resources/icons/16x16/file-save-as.png"/> <action id="rename-command" name="msg.common.rename" mnemonic="R" smicon="/storybook/resources/icons/16x16/rename.png" icon="/storybook/resources/icons/16x16/rename.png"/> <action id="close-command" name="msg.file.close" mnemonic="C" smicon="/storybook/resources/icons/16x16/close.png" icon="/storybook/resources/icons/16x16/close.png" accel="control W"/> <action id="exit-command" name="msg.common.exit" mnemonic="X"/> <action id="export-book-text-command" name="msg.export.book.text" mnemonic="X" smicon="/storybook/resources/icons/16x16/export.png" icon="/storybook/resources/icons/16x16/export.png" accel="control shift P"/> <action id="export-print-command" name="msg.menu.file.export_print" mnemonic="P" smicon="/storybook/resources/icons/16x16/print.png" icon="/storybook/resources/icons/16x16/print.png" accel="control P"/> <action id="open-export-folder-command" name="msg.dlg.export.folder" mnemonic="F" accel="control shift F"/> <action id="document-preferences-command" name="msg.document.preference.title" mnemonic="D"/> <action id="recent-clear-command" name="msg.file.clear.recent"/>
